reference.title: Getting all bucket information
reference.shortdesc: To retrieve all bucket information for a cluster use the GET /pools/default/buckets HTTP method and URI.

section.title: Description
section.p:
To create an SDK for Couchbase, use either the proxy path or the direct path to connect to Couchbase Server. If the SDK uses the direct path, the SDK is not insulated from most reconfiguration changes to the bucket. This means that the SDK needs to either poll the bucketâ€™s URI or connect to the streaming URI to receive updates when the bucket configuration changes. Bucket configuration changes occur under the follow circumstances:
Nodes are added.
Nodes are removed.
Nodes fail.

section.title: Syntax
section.p: Curl request syntax to retrieve information for all buckets in a cluster:
section.codeblock: GET /pools/default/buckets Host: localhost:8091 Authorization: Basic xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx Accept: application/json X-memcachekv-Store-Client-Specification-Version: 0.1

section.title: Example
section.codeblock: GET /pools/default/buckets Host: 10.5.2.54:8091 Authorization: Basic xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx Accept: application/json X-memcachekv-Store-Client-Specification-Version: 0.1
